name: av3d-telegram-feedback
description: Feedback form backend for av3d.by using Node.js and Telegram API

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/assets/css && mkdir -p dist/assets/js && clean-css -o dist/assets/css/styles.css assets/css/styles.css && uglifyjs -o dist/assets/js/script.js assets/js/script.js

author: AVP-Dev
